Package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph

Class UMLGraphLayout.UMLGraphLayoutRow

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLGraphLayout.UMLGraphLayoutRow
Enclosing class:
UMLGraphLayout
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.0.5") public static final class UMLGraphLayout.UMLGraphLayoutRow extends Object
This class is used to layout the UML graph.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final void
    addSymbol(TypeSymbol typeSymbol)
    Add an element to this row; this method will not touch the width and height attributes for this row.
    (package private) final void
    distributeContents(double maxWidth)
    Distributes the symbols in this row horizontally.
    (package private) final Optional<TypeSymbol>
    findByName(String name)
    Returns the type symbol for the type with the given name.
    final TypeSymbol[]
    getContents()
    Returns the UML class doc in this row.
    (package private) final double
    getHeight()
    Returns the minimum height of the row; this is the height of the highest element in the row.
    (package private) final double
    getWidth()
    Returns the minimum width of the row; this is calculated as the sum of the width of the elements plus the value of UMLDocument.SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING (50.0) for each gap (with the gaps before the first and after the last do have half the size).
    final boolean
    isNotEmpty()
    Checks if elements were added to this row.
    (package private) final Optional<TypeSymbol>
    removeSymbol(TypeSymbol typeSymbol)
    Removes the given type symbol from the contents of this row.

  • Constructor Details

    • UMLGraphLayoutRow

      UMLGraphLayoutRow()
      Creates a new UMLGraphLayoutRow object.

  • Method Details

    • addSymbol

      public final void addSymbol(TypeSymbol typeSymbol)
      Add an element to this row; this method will not touch the width and height attributes for this row.
      Parameters:
      typeSymbol - The new symbol.

    • distributeContents

      final void distributeContents(double maxWidth)
      Distributes the symbols in this row horizontally.
      Parameters:
      maxWidth - The maximum width of the row.

    • findByName

      final Optional<TypeSymbol> findByName(String name)
      Returns the type symbol for the type with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name for the element.
      Returns:
      An instance of Optional that holds the desired type symbol.

    • getContents

      public final TypeSymbol[] getContents()
      Returns the UML class doc in this row.
      Returns:
      The contents of this row.

    • getHeight

      final double getHeight()
      Returns the minimum height of the row; this is the height of the highest element in the row.
      Returns:
      The height.

    • getWidth

      final double getWidth()
      Returns the minimum width of the row; this is calculated as the sum of the width of the elements plus the value of UMLDocument.SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING (50.0) for each gap (with the gaps before the first and after the last do have half the size).
      Returns:
      The width.

    • isNotEmpty

      public final boolean isNotEmpty()
      Checks if elements were added to this row.
      Returns:
      true if the row has elements, false otherwise.

    • removeSymbol

      final Optional<TypeSymbol> removeSymbol(TypeSymbol typeSymbol)
      Removes the given type symbol from the contents of this row.
      Parameters:
      typeSymbol - The symbol for the type element to remove.
      Returns:
      An instance of Optional that holds the removed type symbol.
